DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study assess effect mild , moderate severe hepatic impairment pharmacokinetics , safety tolerability BI 10773 follow oral administration BI 10773 single dose .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Empagliflozin ( BI 10773 ) Patients With Impaired Liver Function
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy male female . Hepatically impaired male female subject . Age : 18 75 year , BMI : 1834 kg/m2 Creatinine clearance > 80 mL/min ( except patient severe hepatic impairment , see exclusion criterion . Signed date write informed consent prior admission study accordance GCP local legislation . Exclusion criterion : Healthy subject ( group 1 ) 1 . Chronic relevant acute infection . 6 . History allergy/hypersensitivity . 7 .
